feed.title: Mailcow Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üï∂Ô∏èüêÑ Moogust Update 2024 | Forgot Password?, SOGo 5.11, Rspamd 3.9.1 and More
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5980
  • Allow prompt-less install on low-resource systems by @Ayowel in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5804
  • dovecot: fix precompiling of sieve scripts by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5983
  • Greek names of dovecot folders by @rallisf1 in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5972
  • ui: added enotify and mime as valid options for ui by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5985
  • Bug Fix: Check mailcow.conf exists before work with it by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5987
  • Fix typo in update.sh: word Proceeding by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5989
  • Fix LABEL in Dockerfile, should be key=value by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5990
  • fix: change internal urls for containers using curl on alpine by @Doozy134 in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5967
  • rspamd: upgrade to rspamd 3.9.1 by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5661
  • Refactor: update.sh script with --help should exit with status code 0 by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5991
  • [Fix] Watchdog: escape subject and body for webhooks by @mrclschstr in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5773
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5995
  • Filter to limit ofelia scope by @Kitof in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5776
  • restore: remove tty requirement from restore process to allow for automated restores by @muhlba91 in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5934
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5999
  • [Rspamd] Fix bayes config by @dragoangel in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6000
  • sogo: update to 5.11.0 + Rebase on Bookworm by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6002
  • unbound: fix healthcheck logging + added fail tolerance to checks by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6004
  • flatcurve-fts: limit tokenizers size in e-mail adress by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6006
  • [Web] Add a forgot password flow by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6009
  • .github: Add pull_request_template.md by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6011

Sponsoring

Thank you to the Youth Foundation of Baden-W√ºrttemberg (Germany) for sponsoring the "Forgot Password?" feature!

New Contributors

  • @Ayowel made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5804
  • @rallisf1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5972
  • @h3ssan made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5987
  • @SailReal made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5945
  • @Doozy134 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5967
  • @mrclschstr made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5773
  • @Kitof made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5776
  • @muhlba91 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5934

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2024-07...2024-08 Blog Post for additional informations: https://mailcow.email/posts/2024/release-2024-08/

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üï∂Ô∏èüêÑ Moogust Update 2024 | Revision A (Dovecot CVE Fixes)
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: üöë Fixed version parsing of docker by @jkrgr0 in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6016
  • Refactor/Change Dockerfiles cmd from shell to exec form by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6019
  • dovecot: added timeout option when sa-rules cannot be downloaded by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6025
  • containers: use mariadb-admin instead of deprecated mysqladmin by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6026
  • Fix: bash variables are not quoted by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6022
  • Replace weird character to the correct ' by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6029
  • Pushover/Quarantine utf 8 fix - fixes #6028 by @bluewalk in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6031
  • 2024-08a by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6033
  • Fix: Escape a ' character in update.sh by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6034

New Contributors

  • @jkrgr0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6016

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2024-08...2024-08a Blog: https://mailcow.email/posts/2024/release-2024-08/

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üèÆüêÑ Moovember | Mailbox Rename, SOGo 5.11.1, Rspamd 3.10.2, and More
entry.content:
[!CAUTION] We got some reports of postfix not starting correctly (see https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/issues/6143) before update delete the dns_blocklists.cf file in your data/conf/postfix folder to make sure this file is properly regenerated.

What's Changed

  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6039
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6049
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6053
  • [Postfix] update postscreen_access.cidr by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6056
  • feat: Added check for newer version tags on remote by @Finnlife in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6054
  • chore(deps): update peter-evans/create-pull-request action to v7 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6059
  • compose: added clamd as depends_on to rspamd by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6062
  • [PHP-FPM] Use redis as session store by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6044
  • [SOGo] Fix vacation auto reply date shifting by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6057
  • show last sso login in mailbox table by @q16marvin in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5724
  • feat/nginx-mailcow_brazilian-translations by @airon-assustadus in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6048
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6064
  • Add missing Russian translation by @h3ssan in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6065
  • fix: added tls1.0/1.1 patch for openssl when using older tls versions‚Ä¶ by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6105
  • chore(deps): update thollander/actions-comment-pull-request action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6102
  • [Postfix] update postscreen_access.cidr by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6093
  • chore(deps): update dependency nextcloud/server to v28.0.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6101
  • chore(deps): update dependency phpredis/phpredis to v6.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6098
  • chore(deps): update dependency php/pecl-mail-mailparse to v3.1.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6096
  • chore(deps): update dependency krakjoe/apcu to v5.1.24 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6087
  • sogo: upgrade to 5.11.1 by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6109
  • postfix: add X-Original-To header per default by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6110
  • php: upgrade to alpine 3.20 (base os) by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6106
  • Update dependency twig/twig to v3.14.0 by @MAGICCC in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6071
  • dovecot: activate lazy_expunge plugin per default (unconfigured) by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6112
  • Update mime_types.conf configuration by @patschi in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6013
  • lang.zh-tw.json "memory" translation fix by @SamWang8891 in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6114
  • rspamd: update to 3.10.1 by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6115
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6120
  • Feat/rspamd 3.10.2 by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6122
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6123
  • [Web][DockerApi] Add Feature to Rename Email Addresses by @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6045
  • chore(deps): update thollander/actions-comment-pull-request action to v3.0.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6130
  • [Postfix] update postscreen_access.cidr by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6129
  • fix: broken sogo cron notifications (for appointments etc.) by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6128
  • Translations update from Weblate by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6140

New Contributors

  • @Finnlife made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6054
  • @q16marvin made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/5724
  • @airon-assustadus made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6048
  • @SamWang8891 made their first contribution in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2024-08a...2024-11

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üèÆüêÑ Moovember | Mailbox Rename, SOGo 5.11.1, Rspamd 3.10.2, and More | Revision A
entry.content:
[!NOTE]
This Release Marks Revision A for 2024-11 and is fixing some critical bugs from 2024-11

What's Changed

  • update.sh: precaution ask for deletion of dns_blocklists.cf if old format by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6154
  • [Web] Updated lang.zh-cn.json by @milkmaker in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6151
  • compose: bump sogo version to include 5.11.2 by @DerLinkman in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6156
  • php: use correct php image + workaround of #6149 by @DerLinkman & @FreddleSpl0it in https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/pull/6159

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2024-11...2024-11a

entry.title: New release for Mailcow: üèÆüêÑ Moovember | Mailbox Rename, SOGo 5.11.1, Rspamd 3.10.2, and More | Revision B
entry.content:
[!NOTE]
This Release Marks Revision B for 2024-11 and is fixing some bugs from 2024-11(a)

What's Changed

  • mysql: increased thread_stack to 192k since 10.5.27 by @DerLinkman in d10d64dd9216ca0d0f70280a3c7a4c12bbc463dc
  • [Web] broadcast maildir move to dovecot containers on mailbox_rename by @FreddleSpl0it in 6d1f7482edae6927fa1b2b540d5ef11fa8e2bcb2
  • [Web] update _sogo_static_view on password reset by @FreddleSpl0it in b9f52df3f10e43c1fc9364ff0ef5a6008d959a40

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/compare/2024-11a...2024-11b
